patthana15.70:4.1: Araṇaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.70:5.1: Saraṇaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.70:6.1: Araṇaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naaraṇo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.70:6.2: Araṇaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasaraṇo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.70:8.1: Araṇo abyākato dhammo naaraṇassa naabyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana15.70:8.2: Araṇo abyākato dhammo nasaraṇassa naabyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana15.70:9.1: Ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā anantare samanantare nissaye upanissaye purejāte vippayutte dve … pe … avigate dve.
